Instance.description: Global tuning parameters for the censor effect on the client.

TunableList.name: CensorModes
TunableList.description: Specifies the different ways a censor can be applied, like full body, torso only, etc.

TunableList.name: Bones
TunableList.description: List of rig bones to cover with the censor. If empty, the entire object or sim is censored.

Tunable.name: BoneName
Tunable.description: Rig bone to cover with the censor. Ex: '_b__Pelvis__'. The censor area is expanded to include all geometry influenced by this bone. If the bone is missing, the entire sim will be censored as a safety fallback.

TunableTuple.name: Padding
TunableTuple.description: Padding in meters, in bone space, to add to the bone bounds.

Tunable.name: ModeName
Tunable.description: Name used to select the mode. NOTE: Changing this will break the censor unless the code is updated to use the new mode name!

Tunable.name: DistanceMax
Tunable.description: Upper bound on the view distance used for determining tile size, in meters. Use this to prevent the censor tiles from getting smaller on screen than at a certain distance.

Tunable.name: DistanceMin
Tunable.description: Lower bound on the view distance used for determining tile size, in meters. Use this to prevent the censor tiles from getting bigger on screen than at a certain distance.

Tunable.name: TileWidthMeters
Tunable.description: Size, in meters, of a mosaic tile. The tiles in the censor effect will be sized to match this distance in the world, between the min and max distances.
